metadata.synopsis: Dialog with a brain-washed follower of Cazador. If Astarion is present, he'll be recognised as one of the servant's betters, although the servant is baffled that Astarion isn't downstairs with the others, where he should be.We can learn some general info about the ritual from the servant

10.speaker: Vilhelm
10.text: There is so much to do. So much to make ready.
10.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

16.speaker: Vilhelm
16.text: Master Astarion? What are you doing here? Why aren't you downstairs?
16.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

30.speaker: Vilhelm
30.text: The doors have already been sealed - the ritual is about to begin!
30.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

40.speaker: Player
40.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

83.speaker: Vilhelm
83.text: How can you not know? It's the master's ascension!

77.speaker: Vilhelm
77.text: Tonight he is reborn, even more perfect than before, and his blessings will rain down upon us.

78.speaker: Vilhelm
78.text: All his children were to attend - your brothers and sisters are there already. He'll be furious you didn't make it.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: So unseal the doors and let me in.
72.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

56.speaker: Vilhelm
56.text: It's too late, Godey has sealed the doors and will not open them until the ritual is complete.
56.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

19.speaker: Narrator
19.text: *You remember the ill-tempered skeleton Godey, though you may wish to forget him.*
19.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

88.speaker: Narrator
88.text: *Officially, he was keeper of the palace's kennels, but you knew him as Cazador's muscle - beating you when the master didn't want to do it himself.*
88.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

28.speaker: Vilhelm
28.text: The master will be so angry with you. He will do such terrible, terrible things to you.
28.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

51.speaker: Vilhelm
51.text: I'm wasting time talking to a damned man. There is too much to do - too much to prepare.

86.speaker: Player
86.text: Take my advice - run. Get out of here while you still can.
86.context: NodeContext: almost worried they'll be overheard

1.speaker: Vilhelm
1.text: Abandon the master? At his moment of triumph?
1.context: NodeContext: almost worried they'll be overheard

96.speaker: Vilhelm
96.text: What is wrong with you? Do you wish to spite him again?
96.context: NodeContext: almost worried they'll be overheard

71.speaker: Player
71.context: NodeContext: Can't believe what he just heard

91.speaker: Vilhelm
91.context: NodeContext: Can't believe what he just heard

49.speaker: Vilhelm
49.text: You will not raise a finger against him, you ungrateful, wretched little child!

21.speaker: Vilhelm
21.text: Another guest for the master's celebration? But you're so late - the doors are sealed. All is underway.
21.context: NodeContext: reigns in his initial enthusiasm

45.speaker: Player
45.text: I have a Szarr family ring. Are you really going to turn me away?
45.context: NodeContext: reigns in his initial enthusiasm

26.speaker: Player
26.text: I love celebrations! What's the occasion?
26.context: NodeContext: reigns in his initial enthusiasm

81.speaker: Vilhelm
81.text: Tonight the master completes his ritual of ascension, and - well, the specifics are a matter for those inside.
81.context: NodeContext: reigns in his initial enthusiasm

36.speaker: Vilhelm
36.text: If you wished to join us, you are too late. The master has commanded the doors stay shut until the ritual is complete.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: So unseal them and let me in.

67.speaker: Vilhelm
67.text: We cannot, the master forbids it. None are to enter, none are to leave.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: It can't be underway yet - I'm the entertainment!

23.speaker: Vilhelm
23.text: The master does enjoy a fool...

44.speaker: Vilhelm
44.text: The master does enjoy a fool...

31.text: The master's ascension is a solemn, beautiful event. It does not require 'entertainment'.

68.speaker: Vilhelm
68.text: The master's ascension is a solemn, beautiful event. It does not require 'entertainment'.

84.speaker: Vilhelm
84.text: But it matters not, the doors are sealed. None are to enter, none are to leave.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I know all about the ritual - I'm an honoured guest, not a sacrifice.

87.speaker: Vilhelm
87.text: You're to witness the master's ascension? Oh what fortune. What blessed eyes!

58.speaker: Vilhelm
58.text: You're to witness the master's ascension? Oh what fortune. What blessed eyes!

4.speaker: Vilhelm
4.text: But please, forgive me, I cannot unseal the doors. The master's kennel keeper - Godey - only he is trusted to open them.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: With this ring? Is that how he unlocks them?

54.speaker: Vilhelm
54.text: Forgive me, I did not know you are a member of the family.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I met Godey, but he didn't have a key.

95.speaker: Vilhelm
95.text: He wears the Szarr family signet. Only members of the family can unseal the doors.

52.speaker: Vilhelm
52.text: Now please, I need to prepare - all must be perfect for the master when he ascends.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: And where do I find Godey?

98.speaker: Vilhelm
98.text: If you must find him, he lurks in the kennels below.

92.speaker: Vilhelm
92.text: I must prepare. Soon he will ascend and all must be ready for him.

29.text: Don't you understand? The master forbids the doors be opened, and the master cannot be disobeyed.

34.speaker: Vilhelm
34.text: Don't you understand? The master forbids the doors be opened, and the master cannot be disobeyed.

17.speaker: Vilhelm
17.text: Forgive me, but there is nothing I can do for you.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Excuse me? Your master invited me personally.

41.speaker: Vilhelm
41.text: Well, if the master insists you are to be there, then you must be there.

24.speaker: Vilhelm
24.text: Well, if the master insists you are to be there, then you must be there.

6.text: The master does not invite people 'personally'. The master does not demean himself so.

48.speaker: Vilhelm
48.text: The master does not invite people 'personally'. The master does not demean himself so.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: Your master will be furious if I'm not there. And he'll take it out on you.

60.speaker: Vilhelm
60.text: The master's anger can be... extreme, this is true.

61.speaker: Vilhelm
61.text: The master's anger can be... extreme, this is true.

7.text: The master will do as he wishes, but I will not disobey his command.

9.speaker: Vilhelm
9.text: The master will do as he wishes, but I will not disobey his command.

73.speaker: Vilhelm
73.text: But now I must prepare. His time is almost here and there is still so much to do.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Don't worry, I was just leaving.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: I'm here to kill your master.

37.speaker: Vilhelm
37.text: Another guest for the master's celebration? I'm afraid you're too late, you'll have to-
37.context: NodeContext: going to say "I'm afraid you'll have to leave", but then spotted Astarion

50.speaker: Vilhelm
50.text: Master Astarion? What are you doing here? Why aren't you downstairs?!
50.context: NodeContext: Spots Astarion in the group - shocked

32.speaker: Astarion
32.text: Well, obviously I'm on my way down now. So if you could just point us in the right direction...
32.context: NodeContext: bluffing - he has no idea he's meant to be downstairs

64.speaker: Vilhelm
64.text: But you're too late. The doors have been sealed - the ritual is about to begin!
64.context: NodeContext: not angry, just barking an order

66.speaker: Player
66.context: NodeContext: not angry, just barking an order

39.speaker: Vilhelm
39.text: Perhaps we should not discuss this around strangers...
39.context: NodeContext: not angry, just barking an order

76.speaker: Astarion
76.text: Speak, damn it! What's going on?
76.context: NodeContext: not angry, just barking an order

46.speaker: Vilhelm
46.text: It's the master's ascension. Once the ritual is complete, he is to be reborn, even more perfect and powerful than before.

100.speaker: Vilhelm
100.text: You should be there - all his children were to attend. He'll be furious you're not.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: So unseal the doors and let us in.

27.speaker: Vilhelm
27.text: It's too late, Godey has sealed the doors and will not open them until the ritual is complete.

14.speaker: Astarion
14.text: Cazador gave the key to Godey? And where is the sadistic old sack of bones?

94.speaker: Vilhelm
94.text: It does not matter, you're too late!
94.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

75.speaker: Vilhelm
75.text: The master will be so angry that you missed the ritual. He will do such terrible, terrible things to you.
75.context: NodeContext: almost worried he'll be overheard

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Take my advice - run. Get out of here while you still can.
20.context: NodeContext: almost worried they'll be overheard

5.speaker: Vilhelm
5.text: Abandon the master? At his moment of triumph?
5.context: NodeContext: almost worried they'll be overheard

3.speaker: Vilhelm
3.text: What is wrong with you? Do you wish to spite him again?
3.context: NodeContext: almost worried they'll be overheard

22.speaker: Vilhelm
22.text: I do not have any more time to waste. There is too much to do - too much to prepare.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: We're here to kill your master.

93.speaker: Vilhelm
93.text: You won't raise a finger against him! I won't let you!

62.speaker: Vilhelm
62.text: A new master arises. A new master must be served.

63.speaker: Vilhelm
63.text: It's not true. Master can't be gone - master is eternal.

79.speaker: Vilhelm
79.text: You are late for our celebration - the doors are sealed.

97.speaker: Vilhelm
97.text: There is so much to do. So much to prepare.
